ygData.subject: Re: CORFLUNK QUEST
ygData.msgSnippet: You get the quest in Kaladim, go there and ask around I am sure someone can tell you what to do from there.   Yours,   ~Aereuss Ravins of Tarew Marr   PS --
ygData.messageBody:
You get the quest in Kaladim, go there and ask around I am sure someone can
tell you what to do from there.

PS -- Shock of Lightning is the first real wizard direct damage spell you
get, everything up to this point was almost equivelant to a magician or an
enchanter. It just gets better from here on out.

-----Original Message-----
From: Mata [mailto:mata_eq@...]
Sent: Wednesday, April 28, 1999 8:33 AM
To: EQ WIZARDS
Subject: [eq_wizards] CORFLUNK QUEST


Hey as a wizard I have always run from Corflunk, but last night I saw him
coming down the path at me and I was all alone, but I said "What the hell I
am 12th now!"
and I kicked his tail.�� Even melee!! Like 3 shock of lighnting and a few
staff blows and DEAD ogre.� hehe he hardly touched me!�� Anyway where do I
need to go now that I have his head?�� I mean where do I get the quest?
�
Thanks
�
P.S.� I love Shock of lightning!
